name: Star Asteroid: Infinity
description:
This is a little project that I made about a year ago that I haven't gotten around to uploading until now. Its a simple game where you fly a space ship through an asteroid field. Hope you enjoy it!

How To Play:

  • Pitch - W and S (or Up and Down arrows)
  • Roll - A and D (or Left and Right arrows)
  • Shoot Laser - Space
  • Quick Maneuver Mode - Shift (hold) - Very useful for close encounters with asteroids

Earn points by touching the big orb things. The pointer will show you the way.
